text: The Racine Correctional Institution is a state prison for men located in Sturtevant, Racine County, Wisconsin, owned and operated by the Wisconsin Department of Corrections. The facility opened in 1991 and holds 1573 inmates at medium security. ==References== Category:Prisons in Wisconsin Category:Buildings and structures in Racine County, Wisconsin Category:1991 establishments in Wisconsin
title: Racine Correctional Institution
